name: DODGY DICE (clonethirteen)
description:
DODGY DICE is a chill casual arcade game about dodging dice that don't match your number. Collect dice that do match your number to gain bonus points. Other dice that you dodge are added to your score as they exit the screen. Beware, hitting a dice that does not match your number will result in a damage loss reducing your health points. Health points can be replenished by gathering HEART DICE. You can also collect MODIFIER DICE to increase your points modifier. The modifier decreases overtime, so make sure to grab those at every chance.

The game starts of slow but progress as you play. 

CONTROLS - WASD or ARROW KEYS to move around.

F - request/cancel fullscreen

M - change the music.(There are 2 full chillwave tracks for you to enjoy.)

I hope you enjoy this game and please leave feedback.
